description: A typical Brooklyn stone stoop leads up to this 2-bedroom apartment for rent, located on the first floor  of a 3-story townhouse in the Bushwick neighborhood. The apartment features hardwood floors in the bedrooms and each of its two living rooms, which adjoin but can also be used privately. The kitchen is tiled, and has a backdoor with wooden stairs leading down to a private garden, perfect for sunbathing in the summer. This rental is perfect for travelers on a budget.
name: COZY BIG APARTMENT
